); const responsive = { tablet: { breakpoint: { max: 1024, min: 640 }, items: 2, partialVisibilityGutter: 30 }, mobile: { breakpoint: { max: 640, min: 0 }, items: 1, partialVisibilityGutter: 30 } }; function Inputs(props) { return ( <> erthos™ - Input Solutions
{/* It starts with erthos certified */}

It starts with the erthos™ certified inputs

By simply replacing the input, existing manufacturing lines can create single-use plastics for the new zero-waste economy.

We're not reinventing the wheel, we're just making it more sustainable.
